features: BABY GEAR: The 100% medical grade silicone pacifier clip set are the binky clips that every baby should have. It is all one solid piece so it is safe for your baby to use for teething relief.
PACIFIERS & HOSPITAL BAG ESSENTIALS: The pacifiers are made of 100% medical grade silicone with a one piece solid design making it safe for your baby. The binkie clip is a silicone pacifier holder.
GENDER NEUTRAL BABY ITEMS: Nipple like pacifiers & baby pacifier holder clips can also be used to hold anything or any of our breastfed baby pacifier colors. Paci Clips for your baby girl or boy.

NEWBORN ESSENTIALS MUST HAVES: This is a must for your newborn baby. Our baby binkies are extremely light while being extremely durable with the all one piece design making it especially safe for newborns.
BABY MUST HAVES: The pacifier holder with the matching binkys is the baby binky set every newborn baby needs. These baby girl pacifiers clips and baby boy pacifier clips are are newborn must haves.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Sweet Cotton Baby is a family and veteran owned small business based out of Goodyear, Arizona. Our goal is to provide baby boy stuff and baby girl stuff that aesthetically pleasing and functional for both the baby and the parent.

PACIFIERS FOR BREASTFED BABIES Our paci is accepted by the majority of babies This is the perfect baby girl pacifiers and baby boy pacifiers with all of our color options. Pacifier clips baby girl and boy pacifier clip. Some parents also decide to use our pacifier as a preemie pacifier.

BINKY CLIP Baby Boy Essentials and Baby Essentials Girl The binky holder is universal so it can be used in many different ways. The pacifier is very universal in the way it was designed it can be used as a newborn pacifier, a 6 month pacifier, baby pacifiers 6-18 months or binkies 6-18 months. We have pacifier clips for boys and pacifier clips girl.

This pacifier clip set can be used in many different ways - EASY to take apart! Round Nipple Pacifier The nipple is a round nipple to mimic a breastfeeding pacifier for breastfeeding baby. Considered a newborn baby girl essentials. Soothe your baby to sleep Soothies pacifiers with the binky clip, it will be a great baby soother making it a new baby essentials and diaper bag essentials. Pacifier clip girl! Pacifiers Clips Hold all of your baby accessories and baby necessities with the paci clip and your baby needs will be met! Durable and Stretchable Our baby items must haves are tested and certified to ensure complete safety for your child.

PACIFIER WITH CLIP Silicone pacifier clips neutral and silicone binki The pacifier holders and natural pacifier imitating a nipple are extremely durable and can grow with our baby making this a newborn hospital essentials from the start. Keep your babies pacifier or toys from falling to the ground with our baby pacifier clips.

Are the Silicone Clips Safe? Yes! All of our baby products are lab tested to ensure the material is safe and that the product itself is safe for the baby to use. The Silicone Clips are made of food grade silicone and is all one mold. Can the Pacifier and Plastic Clip be taken off of the Silicone Clip? Yes! Both the pacifier and plastic clip can detach from the silicone clip. The silicone clip is very stretchable so that it can attach to anything and hold anything that you need it to make life easier for you and your baby. What are the Pacifiers made out of? The pacifiers are made out of flexible, soft, food grade silicone. The pacifiers are designed to be very lightweight so that your baby can grasp it and learn how to place the pacifier in their own mouth. Is the silicone material dishwasher safe? Yes! The pacifiers and the clips are dishwasher safe since it is food grade silicone. What age is this starter set intended for? This set is great for newborns making it a perfect baby shower gift! However, the pacifiers and clips can be used until your baby no longer needs a pacifier. The clips can be used universally to keep anything from falling to the ground.
STEAM, BOIL, FREEZE, DISHWASHER Easy to STERILIZE The silicone is safe to steam, boil, freeze, and/ or dishwasher safe for easy cleaning and sterilizing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like that the whole piece is made out of the same material. So it is a pacifier and teether. The clip is plastic and easy to use. It can with the round one and one with a flatter nipple. The whole piece can be sterilized.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The items were fine. I expected 3 but there was only 2.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: they looked nice in the pictures, but when I received them, I found out that they are cheaply made and don't worth the price actually. my nephew didn't take them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Excellent quality for the money. Was not disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: When I bought this, I didn't realize there were two different types of binkies. My son likes the flat ones, and it comes with one flat and one round. For that sole reason, I wouldn't purchase again, but he does really like the flat one that comes in the package! I would suggest this for people whose babies take either shape.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality paci
reviews.reviewText: My daughter liked the paci. She likes round solid ones and this was perfect. It even came with the cord to keep it from falling off her mouth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute and trendy
reviews.reviewText: Standard pacifiers with a cool beaded clip. The little one seems to like it so far.
